query: Do cross-examination materials reveal contradictions in testimony?
output:
CLAUDE CODE ANALYSIS
Query: Do cross-examination materials reveal contradictions in testimony?

RELEVANT DOCUMENT EXCERPTS:

[Bassim Draft Witness Statement.docx, p.1]
In 2003, I founded Channel IT to cater and provide supplies and services to the telecom industry in Nigeria, where I was born. In 2011, I created Channel VAS, a company that became a leading vendor of mobile VAS (value-added service) and mobile financial services for emerging markets across the globe. Channel IT operates in 19 countries, providing crucial infrastructure across Africa and the Middle East.

[2. Danny Farnham Direct Outline with Cross & Redirect.docx, p.1]
Are 192-month inspection scopes generally predictable across the G550 fleet?

[2. Danny Farnham Direct Outline with Cross & Redirect.docx, p.1]
CROSS-EXAM SUMMARY TABLE – DANNY FARNHAM

[2. Danny Farnham Direct Outline with Cross & Redirect.docx, p.1]
“Every aircraft is unique” | Inspections are standardized across fleet | “How standardized is a G550 192-month scope?” | Farnham pp. 6–7

[Joe Rivera Outline #1.docx, p.1]
CROSS-EXAMINATION OUTLINE – JOSEPH RIVERA (VP, Service Center Operations)

[Joe Rivera Outline #1.docx, p.1]
Here are two additional impeachment sequences for cross-examining Joseph Rivera—one on staffing failures and one on discrepancy management failures—each crafted to corner him on internal inconsistencies, undermine credibility, and support a mismanagement narrative.

[CITIOM Statement of Claim.pdf, p.2]
and across its various service centers.

DIRECT EXAMINATION OUTLINE – DANNY FARNHAM
